price: The Messenger said, “O my Lord, my people have taken this Qur’an as a thing to be abandoned[16].”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا
footnotes: [16] i.e., not reading it; not listening to it; not understanding it; not living by it; not conveying it to others; preferring something else to it, etc.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-rasūlu yārabbi inna qawmī ittakhadhū hādhā al-qur'āna mahjūran
